mapper.select: SELECT o.id AS "order_id", o.due_date AS "due_date", e.fio AS "employe_fio", ed.name AS "edition_name", r.name AS "reading_room_name" FROM ADMIN.ORDERS o LEFT JOIN ADMIN.EMPLOYE e ON o.edition_id=e.id LEFT JOIN ADMIN.CARD c ON c.id = o.card_id LEFT JOIN ADMIN.EDITION ed ON o.edition_id = ed.id LEFT JOIN ADMIN.READING_ROOM r ON r.id = o.reading_room_id WHERE c.id = #{id} ORDER BY o.id DESC
